text: Tall Unlimited (トール アンリミテッド) (Tall Infinity in North America) is a puzzle video game released December 22, 1999, in Japan for the PlayStation. On October 19, 2010, the game was released on the PlayStation 3 and the PlayStation Portable as a "PSOne Classic." The main objective of the game is to strategically construct a tower with multi-colored blocks. ==References== Category:PlayStation (console) games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:Puzzle video games Category:1999 video games Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Tall Unlimited
